Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2008 01:07AM CJBush108 wrote: hello,everyone,im sorry it took me a while to respond that my lumpectomy surgery went well on jan 24th,2008,but a week later,i was told by my doc that they found more suspicious cancer cells in the ducts.I was devastated that now i will be going through mod,rad,masectomy on lb. my surgery was on april 4th,but it was canceled due to a cellusitis infection,i am on antibodics since friday,but there is still no change and i am very worried. My history of taking antibodics usually stops anything in 2 days.   P/s i was first diagnosed with LCIS in jan.
Posts.Title: Anyone having surgery in April?? ottawagirl wahine
